summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 3, Sea View Park Addition, being the alley between 41st Avenue Southwest and 42nd Avenue Southwest, from West Brandon Street to West Dawson and certain other alleys; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 14936 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
